General.Name: North Arrow Minerals Inc
General.Description: North Arrow Minerals Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration for diamond properties in Canada. The company explores for lithium, diamond, and gold properties. Its principal lithium properties are the DeStaffany and LDG projects located in Northwest Territories; and the Bathurst Inlet project situated in Nunavut. The company also has interests in various legacy diamond properties, including the Naujaat project located in Nunavut; the Pikoo project situated in Saskatchewan; and the Loki project located in Northwest Territories. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
